name: Behind The Block
description:
Behind The Block is a PVP video game. Defeat your opponent using power-ups or wait until your rival mess up :D

No mouse needed to play the game, just a keyboard and a friend. Enjoy!

I will update the game with more levels, power-ups and game modes.

Feedback and comments are welcome :)

VERSION 1.1:

-Capture The Flag game mode added.

-3 new levels added.

-1 new power-up added.
